# isEmpty

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the range of text represented by the receiver is zero-length.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEmpty: Bool { get }
```

## Defining Ranges of Text

- **start**: The start of a range of text.
- **end**: The end of the range of text.

items.description: The start of a range of text.
items.name: start

items.description: The end of the range of text.
items.name: end
